title: Verify successful login redirects to dashboard
steps: Check that user name is visible in the dashboard header
expected_result: User is redirected to dashboard and authenticated session is stored

title: Verify invalid login shows error message
steps: Check for toast notification with text 'Invalid credentials'
expected_result: Error message is shown and user remains on login page

title: Verify unauthenticated user is redirected from dashboard to login
Check if user data is fetched after login
steps: Verify response data populates user name, profile image, and stats
expected_result: User information is correctly displayed on dashboard

title: Verify todos load successfully after dashboard
steps: Wait for API call to /todos to resolve
Verify todo items are rendered in the table
expected_result: All existing todos are displayed correctly

title: Add a new todo item successfully
steps: Verify new todo appears in the list
expected_result: New todo is displayed in the list with correct text

title: Delete a todo item successfully
steps: Click delete icon on first todo
expected_result: Todo is removed from UI and deleted from API

title: Verify error state when todo API fails
steps: Observe error boundary or retry button display
expected_result: Error message and retry button shown when API fails

title: Verify keyboard navigation on login form
steps: Use TAB key to switch between email, password, and submit button
Ensure visible focus state appears on each element
expected_result: Keyboard navigation works correctly with visible focus indicators

title: Check ARIA accessibility in todo list
steps: Inspect DOM elements for ARIA attributes on add button, input field, and list items
expected_result: All interactive elements have correct ARIA roles and labels
